description:
This is a rare weapon dropped by a babble.
On rare occasions when attacking, babbles will come to your aid for a short while.

This is a rare weapon dropped by a babble.
On rare occasions when attacking, babbles will come to your aid for a short while.
The upgrades increase the power of the weapon and the chance of it coming to your aid.

This is a rare weapon dropped by a babble.
On rare occasions when attacking, babbles will come to your aid for a short while.
Further upgrades increase the power of the weapon and the chance of it coming to your aid.

This is a rare shield dropped by a babble.
On rare occasions when attacked by an enemy, babbles will come to your aid for a short while.

This is a rare shield dropped by a babble.
On rare occasions when attacked by an enemy, babbles will come to your aid for a short while.
The upgrades increase the defence of the shield and the chance of it coming to your aid.

This is a rare shield dropped by a babble.
On rare occasions when attacked by an enemy, babbles will come to your aid for a short while.
Further upgrades increase the defence of the shield and the chance of it coming to your aid.
The gun is made of a chimeric material that releases various fluids and can emit a sludge field that causes biological damage.
The gun is made of a chimeric material that releases various liquids and can release a field of cold damaging extinguishing fire.
The gun is made of a chimeric material that releases various liquids and can emit a field of shadows that cause cut damage.
The gun is made of a chimeric material that releases various liquids and can emit a dizzying field that causes flame damage.
The gun is made of a chimeric material that releases various fluids and can emit a clairvoyant field that does pure damage.
This is a very light knife made from mystical bird material.Your movement speed increases with each attack.
This is a very light knife made from mystical bird material.Your movement speed increases with each attack.
This is a very light knife made from mystical bird material.Your movement speed increases with each attack.
The tip of this lance is as cold as ice. It is possible to send the illusion of the ice lance far and wide for long-range attacks.
The tip of this lance is as cold as ice. It is possible to send the illusion of the ice lance far and wide for long-range attacks.
The tip of this lance is as cold as ice. It is possible to send the illusion of the ice lance far and wide for long-range attacks.
This is a minigun made of cactus. The power is incredibly low, but the bullets refill on their own.

The King's Sword of Walilnorth is a sword that appears in the Tales of the Kings of Walilnorth.This sword has been passed down from generation to generation in the royal family of Walilnorth, and is a treasure that serves as a symbol of the royal family.Legend has it that long ago, when an evil dragon attacked Waril North, the wielder of this champion's sword fought bravely and vanquished the evil dragon, and from this legend, it is said that it became a reminder that the wielder of this sword must have both courage and strength.However, the sword itself is not particularly powerful.It is a legendary weapon and has no special power.

The Straight Sword of Death of Yaeza is a sword that appears in the Tales of King Walilnoth.This sword is also known as the 'Sword of Reincarnation,' which derives from the fact that those who are buried by this sword will be reincarnated.The straight sword of death of Yaeza belonged to one of the four swordsmen that King Walilnose chose as his companions when he set out on his adventurous journey.The swordsman's name was Yaeza, who was not only an outstanding swordsman, but also a man of outstanding character, and King Walilnorth trusted him deeply.However, Yaeza lost his life during the journey.The sword, which remained in his hand even after Yaeza's death, had a mysterious power: it could guide mortals to their destiny.It is also said that those who are buried with this sword can be reborn into a new life.

The Alamoa Spirit Sword is named after the fairy king who is said to have joined King Walilnose in the battle of Fort Alamo. When the sword is swung, an invisible spirit makes an additional attack on another target.

name.str: The Sword of Confusion and Starlight

description: The Sword of Confusion and Starlight is a sword that appears in the Tales of King Walilnorth.This sword was It is said that the sword has two effects.The first is that the light emitted from the blade, which is charged with magic power, confuses the opponent.The second is that the wind generated when the sword is swung blows the opponent away.

It is a magic sword whose blade has been dyed black by the power of an unusual ability.It is said to be so sharp that it can cut through even the hardest of objects as easily as tofu.However, there is a disadvantage: when cut by this weapon, the part of the sword that is cut is also dyed black.

The acrobat's rainbow sword is a sword that is controlled by a circus acrobat.Acrobats specialize in aerial trapeze, juggling, and other acrobatic feats, of which the rainbow sword is the most difficult and dangerous, and failure to perform it can result in serious injury.The acrobat's Rainbow Sword is performed on a rope that is strung higher than the acrobat's own height, and during the performance, the acrobat makes a slashing gesture with the sword in his hand toward the Audience (performer posing as audience). During the performance, the acrobat makes a slashing gesture toward the audience with the sword in his hand, which causes blood to spray from the audience's neck, and when the juggler swings his sword again, the spectator falls directly to the ground, a terrifying sight.This performance is now banned because of an incident in which a person was actually decapitated, and people who witnessed it were so horrified that they stopped watching the circus afterwards. However, even today, however, some acrobats still seem to perform this performance.

Thirteenth Needle of Resentment Slaughter is a cursed magical sword wielded by a knight trapped in a grudge.It is said that those who are wounded by the sword die, with blood spurting from their entire body.This sword was once used by the knights of the Warilnorth nation to cover the heroes in the battle between the heroes and the Demon King.However, the hero was taken in by a grudge, went out of control, and in the end wounded his comrades.As a result, the hero is said to have taken his own life.

name.str: The Sword of Termination and Waste

description: The Sword of Termination and Waste is a sword that appears in the Tales of King Walilnorth.This sword is said to have been made by an enemy witch who cast a spell on King Walilnorth when he and his entourage of knights fought at the Alamo fortress.The sword is imbued with powerful magical powers and has the ability to read the minds and memories of those who touch it.It also has the terrifying power to force those touched by its blade to remember the fears within their own hearts.

The Deadly Sword of No-Rayu is a sword that appears in the Tales of King Walilnorth.It is said to have the power to manipulate the souls of the dead and make them repeat their actions in life.Using this power, King Walil North is said to have destroyed his enemies many times.After his death, however, the sword was sealed in the royal cemetery and is said to be guarded by the tomb guard dogs.

name.str: The Sword of the Merciful and Relentless

description: The Sword of the Merciful and Relentless is a sword that appears in the Tales of King Walilnorth.It is said that this sword is a magical sword that changes its appearance depending on its wielder, and that it displays various abilities depending on the wielder.It is also said that its ability is dependent on the quality of the wielder, so even if the same person uses it, it will have a completely different ability.However, it is said that the true power of the sword is only demonstrated when the wielder becomes a truly powerful person, and no one has yet demonstrated its true power.Incidentally, when King Walilnorth used it, it was said to be a holy sword that healed its user.

a dagger made of a very light magic material.It can recover a small amount of mana with a normal attack, and can also use a skill that allows it to move instantly to a target point, piercing and damaging enemies in its path.
It is a spear that does little damage. If the target's HP is below a certain level at the time of the attack, it can be seduced for a short while.
It is an inflexible vine whip made of steel.The vines entangle at the point of attack.
This crossbow smells like sweet honey. It can be loaded with up to 3 bolts!
//: 800 lbs, 40in steel limbs, 0.41 Slugs with a 30g bolt, 2.0 slugs with a special 0.5 lb bolt

description: These crossbow bolts smell like sweet honey.The target of the shot is covered in honey, which reduces movement speed.
This assault rifle is made from crystallized honey. Covering it with sticky honey can slow down the enemy's movement.
This burst rifle is made from crystallized honey. Covering it with sticky honey can slow down the enemy's movement.
This beam rifle is made from crystallized honey. Shoots a beam of sticky honey at the target enemy.
This Shotgun is made from crystallized honey. Shoots hot honey at the target enemy. Each shot consumes 5 bullets.
This Hand Cannon is made from crystallized honey. Shoots a lump of exploding honey at the target point. Each shot consumes 20 bullets.
This sub machine gun is made from crystallized honey. Covering it with sticky honey can slow down the enemy's movement.
This is a wrench imbued with magical power. In addition to being used as a normal wrench, it can also unleash its magical power to heal the robot.
A hand-held grass-cutting tool with a cast bronze blade, fastened to a wood handle wrapped with leather.
This is an old-fashioned farming tool used to cut tall grass.  While it may be a giant blade on the end of a stick, it is incredibly awkward to use for anything but its intended purpose.
Short bow enhanced by magic. It requires less muscle power than a regular bow and is slightly more powerful.
